_header: This world is born up by estates seven
Note: Stanzas 3-7 appear separately in other MSS as 939; stanzas 23 to end appear separately in other MSS as 5533.
_description: ?John Lydgate, ‘A Pageant of Knowledge’ — thirty-nine rhyme royal and eight-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

CamTCC601.First Lines:
thys world ys born vp by astates seuynPrynce ordeynyd to susteyn
                    ryghtPrestes to pray þe lustyces to deme euynMarchauntes in
                    sellyng to do trouþe in weyght…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…And er þu passe hens remyssion finallTowarde þe
                    lyfe where ioy ys euerlastyng
CamTCC601.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. II: Secular Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 192 (1934); repr. 1961: 724-34.
